features.name: Module Installation and Registration
features.description: Verifies that the AccountSettings module installs correctly and registers with the DNN/Evoq framework
test_scenarios: Verify module installs without errors
Confirm module appears in installed extensions list
Verify assembly is deployed to bin folder
Check module dependencies are satisfied
Verify Azure compatibility flag is set correctly

features.name: PersonaBar Menu Integration
features.description: Tests the AccountSettings menu item appears correctly in the PersonaBar navigation
test_scenarios: Verify Accounts menu item appears in PersonaBar
Check menu icon displays correctly (useravatar css class)
Verify menu order/position is 980
Test menu item localization displays 'Accounts'
Verify menu identifier is 'Evoq.Accounts'

features.name: Permission-Based Access Control
features.description: Validates that only authorized users can access the AccountSettings module
test_scenarios: Verify Administrators can access the module
Verify Content Managers can access the module
Verify Content Editors can access the module
Verify Community Managers can access the module
Verify regular users cannot see/access the module
Test API controller enforces admin-level permissions

features.name: Module UI Loading
features.description: Tests that the AccountSettings UI loads and displays correctly
test_scenarios: Verify HTML template loads without errors
Check 'Hello World, This is Site Settings.' text displays
Verify Save button renders correctly
Test JavaScript module initialization
Verify load function executes without errors
Check extensions div container is present
Verify RequireJS/AMD module loading works

features.name: Web API Controller
features.description: Tests the AccountSettings Web API controller endpoint
test_scenarios: Verify controller inherits from PersonaBarApiController
Test controller requires admin permissions
Verify controller is accessible via API routes
Check logging initialization
Test controller responds to HTTP requests

features.name: Save Button Functionality
features.description: Tests the Save button element in the UI (currently non-functional placeholder)
test_scenarios: Verify Save button is visible
Check Save button has 'primarybtn' CSS class
Test Save button click event (currently no handler)
Verify button is accessible via keyboard navigation

features.name: Module Resources and Localization
features.description: Validates resource files and localization support
test_scenarios: Verify resource file loads correctly
Test 'nav_AccountSettings.Text' resource returns 'Accounts'
Check module icon file exists and displays
Test localization in different languages if available

features.name: Extension Placeholder Infrastructure
features.description: Tests the extension point for future account settings features
test_scenarios: Verify 'tabs-extensions' div container exists
Check 'personabar-extensions' CSS class is applied
Test Components controller class exists for future implementation
Verify extension point can be targeted by other modules
